name: Don't Die Again
description:
Feudal Japan is overrun by a horde of zombies – and you're one of them!
Don’t Die Again provides simple, yet highly enjoyable fast-paced gameplay with a variety of combat encounters. Indefinite replayability is ensured by the procedural level generation, making every single playthrough unique.


CONTROL SCHEME

Keyboard & Mouse

Player Movement
WASD - Keys
Attack (Bite)
Arrow - Keys
Zombie CallRFeast on Corpse
FOpen/Close Menu
ESC



ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Don't Die Again,  is the resulting product of a game development project executed during the 5th semester of the course Animation&Game at h_da Highschool of Applied Sciences in Darmstadt, Germany.

Development Time: ~ 4.5 months (Oct '20 - Feb'21)
